file.path: D:\TorrentDir\Enid Blyton E-Book Collection\Secret Seven\Shock for the Secret Seven - Enid Blyton.epub
file.name: Shock for the Secret Seven - Enid Blyton.epub

tika.dc.description:
Product Description

Dogs are disappearing from the village, but the Seven are so busy arguing and falling out with each other that they don't even notice. Then poor Scamper becomes the latest victim and it's all systems go for the Secret Seven!

About the Author

Birthplace: West Dulwich, London Whereabouts: Deceased Enid Blyton died in 1968 but remains one of the best-known and best-loved writers of children's stories. She is consistently voted a children's favourite in author polls. She has over 600 children's books to her credit, including the Famous Five series, the Secret Seven series, the Naughtiest Girl series (all Hodder) and the Malory Towers and St Clare's series (both available from Hodder on audio).
